title: Authors and Citation
text: Morzaria-Luna H (2023). pssalmonsurvival: Sensitivity analysis salmon survival Puget Sound. R package version 0.0.0.9006.
code: @Manual{,   title = {pssalmonsurvival: Sensitivity analysis of salmon survival in Puget Sound},   author = {Hem Nalini Morzaria-Luna},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9006}, }

what: Package for the analysis of cumulative impacts on salmon survival in Puget Sound. Simulated using an Atlantis Ecosystem model
title: Sensitivity analysis of salmon survival in Puget Sound
text: Hem Nalini Morzaria-Luna1,2, Isaac C. Kaplan3, Chris J. Harvey3, Michael Schmidt1,4, Elizabeth . Fulton5, Raphael Girardin6, Parker MacCready7 Long Live Kings. 1326 5th Ave #450, Seattle, WA 98101. Corresponding author Visiting scientist.
